title: About rank emblems on forum profile
body:
Why i can't see those shiny emblems in forums, was thinking it will eventually show up but it's been many seasons and it isn't showing up :)

Ty.

replies.body:
I've seen that emblem for Season 6 has been added and it's fine now but i haven't had any emblem so far in boards. Played since Season 3 on this account.

It's purely for 'cosmetic' reasons :) If it's not too much time consuming i'd like emblems for S3, S5 to show too ( haven't played ranked in S4 ).

Sorry for late reply, case closed.
Which specific ranked season emblems are you looking for, and for which specific seasons?
